description: Defines the ReminderLog entity class for logging reminder delivery attempts, including fields for invoice reference, schedule, channel, status, message ID, error message, sent timestamp, creation, and update timestamps.

classes.name: ReminderLog
classes.description: Entity class representing a log entry for a reminder attempt, associated with an invoice and optionally a reminder schedule.

methods.name: ReminderLog
methods.description: Default constructor for the ReminderLog class.
